targets.expr:
(
  sum(app_git_commit{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (git_hash)
)
   + on(job) group_left(version)
(
   0 * sum(app_version{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (version)
)
   + on(job) group_left(peer_name)
(
   0 * sum(app_peer_name{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (peer_name)
)
   + on(job) group_left(network)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_network{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (network)
)
   + on(job) group_left(cluster_hash)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_operators{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (cluster_hash)
 
   + on(job) group_left(cluster_name)
(
   0 * sum(cluster_operators{cluster_name="$cluster_name",cluster_hash="$cluster_hash",cluster_peer="$cluster_peer"}) by (cluster_name)
))

panels.description: Node is healthy if Beacon Node connected and synced and at least quorum peers are connected.
panels.title: Healthy

panels.description:
- **Peer**: The peer's name (inferred from their *charon-enr-private-key*)
- **You**: â­ï¸ is this local charon node
- **Connected**: Whether you are currently connected to this peer.
- **Direct**: Whether the connection is *direct* (ðŸ‘) or *relay* (ðŸ‘Ž) 
- **Latency**: The time messages take to travel to/from the peer.
- **Uptime**" The duration since peer was restarted.
- **ClockDiff**: Difference between local and peer's clock time. More than 2s is bad.
- **Attest**: Number of attestation duties performed in the time window.
- **PrepareAgg**: Number of aggregation preparation duties performed in the time window.
- **Aggregate**: Number of aggregations  duties performed in the time window.
- **Propose**: Number of block proposal duties performed in the time window.
panels.title: Peer Connectivity and Duty Participation

panels.description: Most frequent errors and warnings grouped by message. Use data link to show logs.
panels.title: Top Warnings and Errors

panels.title: Failed duty reasons
